biotools.summary: MIIT is a Python framework for integrating spatially resolved multi-omics data. The main spatial-omics technologies that we focus on are Spatial Transcriptomics (through Visium) and MSI (ImzML). There is additional_data support for various types of annotations (pointset valued data, geojson data, and masks).
